x1 <- c(4.17,5.58,5.18,6.11,4.50,4.61,5.17,4.53,5.33,5.14)
y <- c(4.81,4.17,4.41,3.59,5.87,3.83,6.03,4.89,4.32,4.69)
x2 <- c(2, 10, 20, 2, 10, 20, 2, 10, 20, 2)

lm.D9 <- lr(formula)
